My Creative Process

All of my projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

It is really important to cover all parameters with the client and your team to assure all requirements are met as well as issues resolved.

2

Brainstorming ^ Concept

Going in depth with all possiblilities and possible outcomes. Deciding on a suitable SDk and framework that will maximize dynamic abilities.

3

UI/UX Planning

Using my past experiences and knowledge to utilize a correct design for each element that provides a clean look as well as optimized ability.

4

Interaction

Testing, Split-testing and automated testing to assure all bugs and errors do not reach production.
